TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract ApplicationFactory implements class Microsoft.Office.Tools.Factory

summary.span: 提供可用于在应用程序级外接程序中执行杂项任务（如在运行时创建功能区控件以及向工作表添加智能标记）的方法。

span.span: Provides methods you can use to perform miscellaneous tasks in application-level add-ins, such as creating Ribbon controls at run time and adding smart tags to worksheets.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要获取对象，请使用`Globals.Factory`在项目中的属性。To get a object, use the `Globals.Factory` property in your project. 有关详细信息，请参阅[对 Office 项目中的对象的全局访问](/visualstudio/vsto/global-access-to-objects-in-office-projects)。For more information, see [Global Access to Objects in Office Projects](/visualstudio/vsto/global-access-to-objects-in-office-projects). [!INCLUDE[vsto_interface](~/includes/vsto-interface-md.md)]

Docs.summary: 创建一个 对象，该对象表示智能标记的一个操作。Creates a object that represents an action for a smart tag. [!INCLUDE[vsto_smart_tags](~/includes/vsto-smart-tags-md.md)]。.

span.span: The new smart tag action.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何在 Excel 工作簿项目中创建智能标记和一个操作。The following code example demonstrates how to create a smart tag and an action in an Excel workbook project. 若要使用此示例中，运行中的代码`ThisAddIn`类。To use this example, run the code from the `ThisAddIn` class. [!code-csharp[Trin_ExcelSmartTags#2](~/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_OfficeSP/Trin_ExcelSmartTags/CS/Trin_ExcelSmartTags.cs#2)] [!code-vb[Trin_ExcelSmartTags#2](~/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_OfficeSP/Trin_ExcelSmartTags/VB/ThisWorkbook.vb#2)]

MemberSignature.Value: public Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.SmartTag CreateSmartTag (string smartTagType, string caption, Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.ISmartTagExtension extension = null);

.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.SmartTag CreateSmartTag(string smartTagType, string caption, class Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.ISmartTagExtension extension) cil managed

param.name: smartTagType
param.span: 智能标记的唯一标识符，由命名空间 URI 和标记类型名组成，两部分之间用数字符号 (#) 分隔。

span.span: A unique identifier for the smart tag, composed of a namespace URI and a tag type name separated by a number sign (#).

param.name: caption
param.span: 智能标记菜单上显示的智能标记的名称。

span.span: The name of the smart tag, which is displayed on the smart tag menu.

param.name: extension

span.span: Optional.

param.span: 一个扩展对象，用于为智能标记定义自定义识别器。

span.span: An extension object that defines a custom recognizer for the smart tag.

Docs.summary: 创建一个 对象，该对象表示工作表中的一个智能标记。Creates a object that represents a smart tag on a worksheet. [!INCLUDE[vsto_smart_tags](~/includes/vsto-smart-tags-md.md)]。.

span.span: The new smart tag.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 有效字符串的示例`smartTagType`参数是http://smarttags.contoso.com#TagName。An example of a valid string for the `smartTagType` parameter is http://smarttags.contoso.com#TagName. 字符串格式正确的智能标记类型不包含空格，并下划线 (_) 或一个冒号 （:） 以字母 (a-z、 A 到 Z)，它启动。A well-formed smart tag type string does not contain white space, and it starts with a letter (a-z, A-Z), an underscore (_), or a colon (:). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何创建 Excel 外接程序项目中的智能标记和一个操作。The following code example demonstrates how to create a smart tag and an action in an Excel add-in project. 若要使用此示例中，运行中的代码`ThisAddIn`类。To use this example, run the code from the `ThisAddIn` class. [!code-csharp[Trin_ExcelSmartTags#2](~/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_OfficeSP/Trin_ExcelSmartTags/CS/Trin_ExcelSmartTags.cs#2)] [!code-vb[Trin_ExcelSmartTags#2](~/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_OfficeSP/Trin_ExcelSmartTags/VB/ThisWorkbook.vb#2)]

exception.span: 或 为 或为空，或者 无效。

span.span: or is either or empty, or is not valid.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.Workbook GetVstoObject(class Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel._Workbook workbook) cil managed

param.name: workbook
param.span: 要为其检索扩展对象的本机工作簿对象。

span.span: The native workbook object for which to retrieve the extended object.

param.span: 虽然此参数的类型是 ，但通常会将 对象传递到此方法。

span.span: Although this parameter is of type , you typically pass a object to this method.

summary.span: 返回 主机项，它将展开指定本机工作簿对象的功能。

span.span: Returns a host item that extends the functionality of the specified native workbook object.

returns.span: 主机项可扩展本机工作簿对象的功能。

span.span: The host item that extends the functionality of the native workbook object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在应用程序级外接程序自定义在 Excel 中打开任何工作簿中调用此方法。Call this method in an application-level add-in to customize any workbook that is open in Excel. 此方法将生成一个新对象如果已生成任何此类对象。This method generates a new object if no such object has already been generated. 后续调用此方法返回的缓存的实例的现有对象。Subsequent calls to this method return the cached instance of the existing object. 有关更多信息，请参见 [在运行时在 VSTO 外接程序中扩展 Word 文档和 Excel 工作簿](/visualstudio/vsto/extending-word-documents-and-excel-workbooks-in-vsto-add-ins-at-run-time)。For more information, see [Extending Word Documents and Excel Workbooks in VSTO Add-ins at Run Time](/visualstudio/vsto/extending-word-documents-and-excel-workbooks-in-vsto-add-ins-at-run-time). > [!NOTE] > 设置为"已启用宏"或"默认情况下禁用宏"时，VSTO 会遵循"自动化安全性"Office 组策略设置。VSTO follows the “Automation Security” Office group policy setting when it is set to “Macros enabled” or “Disable Macros by default”. 但是，VSTO 将始终允许自动化运行如果默认情况下，设置为"使用应用程序宏安全级别"，而不考虑应用程序设置。However, VSTO will always allow automation to run if the setting is set to “Use application macro security level”, regardless of the application setting. 若要防止 VSTO 允许运行的自动化，请选择"默认情况下禁用宏"设置。To prevent VSTO from allowing automation to run, choose the “Disable Macros by default” setting. > > `workbook`参数的类型是，这是父接口的。The `workbook` parameter is of type , which is the parent interface of . 因此，此方法可以接受这两种类型的对象：和。Therefore, this method can accept objects of both types: and . 通常情况下，在引用 Excel 工作簿时，您使用。Typically, when you reference an Excel workbook, you use a . ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建active Excel 工作簿主机项。The following code example creates a host item for the active Excel workbook. 若要使用此代码，请在针对 `ThisAddIn` 或 [!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)]的 Excel 外接程序项目中从 [!INCLUDE[net_v45](~/includes/net-v45-md.md)] 类运行它。To use this code, run it from the `ThisAddIn` class in an Excel add-in project that targets the [!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)] or the [!INCLUDE[net_v45](~/includes/net-v45-md.md)]. [!code-csharp[Trin_ExcelAddIn_Extensions#1](~/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_OfficeSP/Trin_ExcelAddIn_Extensions/cs/ThisAddIn.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Trin_ExcelAddIn_Extensions#1](~/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_OfficeSP/Trin_ExcelAddIn_Extensions/vb/ThisAddIn.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在应用程序级外接程序自定义在 Excel 中打开任意工作表中调用此方法。Call this method in an application-level add-in to customize any worksheet that is open in Excel. 此方法将生成一个新对象如果已生成任何此类对象。This method generates a new object if no such object has already been generated. 后续调用此方法返回的缓存的实例的现有对象。Subsequent calls to this method return the cached instance of the existing object. 有关更多信息，请参见 [在运行时在 VSTO 外接程序中扩展 Word 文档和 Excel 工作簿](/visualstudio/vsto/extending-word-documents-and-excel-workbooks-in-vsto-add-ins-at-run-time)。For more information, see [Extending Word Documents and Excel Workbooks in VSTO Add-ins at Run Time](/visualstudio/vsto/extending-word-documents-and-excel-workbooks-in-vsto-add-ins-at-run-time). > [!NOTE] > `worksheet`参数的类型是，这是父接口的。The `worksheet` parameter is of type , which is the parent interface of . 因此，此方法可以接受这两种类型的对象：和。Therefore, this method can accept objects of both types: and . 通常情况下，在引用 Excel 工作表时，您使用。Typically, when you reference an Excel worksheet, you use a . ## Examples 下面的代码示例将创建为每个主机项都有一个主机项的对象。The following code example creates a host item for each object that has a host item. 若要使用此代码，请在针对 `ThisAddIn` 或 [!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)]的 Excel 外接程序项目中从 [!INCLUDE[net_v45](~/includes/net-v45-md.md)] 类运行它。To use this code, run it from the `ThisAddIn` class in an Excel add-in project that targets the [!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)] or the [!INCLUDE[net_v45](~/includes/net-v45-md.md)]. [!code-csharp[Trin_ExcelAddIn_Extensions#2](~/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_OfficeSP/Trin_ExcelAddIn_Extensions/cs/ThisAddIn.cs#2)] [!code-vb[Trin_ExcelAddIn_Extensions#2](~/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_OfficeSP/Trin_ExcelAddIn_Extensions/vb/ThisAddIn.vb#2)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在应用程序级外接程序自定义的 Excel 工作表中的任何列表对象中调用此方法。Call this method in an application-level add-in to customize any list object in an Excel worksheet. 此方法将生成一个新对象如果已生成任何此类对象。This method generates a new object if no such object has already been generated. 后续调用此方法返回的缓存的实例的现有对象。Subsequent calls to this method return the cached instance of the existing object. 有关更多信息，请参见 [在运行时在 VSTO 外接程序中扩展 Word 文档和 Excel 工作簿](/visualstudio/vsto/extending-word-documents-and-excel-workbooks-in-vsto-add-ins-at-run-time)。For more information, see [Extending Word Documents and Excel Workbooks in VSTO Add-ins at Run Time](/visualstudio/vsto/extending-word-documents-and-excel-workbooks-in-vsto-add-ins-at-run-time). ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建宿主项。The following code example creates a host item. 若要使用此代码，请在针对 `ThisAddIn` 或 [!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)]的 Excel 外接程序项目中从 [!INCLUDE[net_v45](~/includes/net-v45-md.md)] 类运行它。To use this code, run it from the `ThisAddIn` class in an Excel add-in project that targets the [!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)] or the [!INCLUDE[net_v45](~/includes/net-v45-md.md)]. param.name: workbook
param.span: 要测试的本机工作簿对象。

span.span: The native workbook object to test.

param.span: 虽然此参数的类型是 ，但通常会将 对象传递到此方法。

span.span: Although this parameter is of type , you typically pass a object to this method.

returns.span: 如果指定的 对象存在 宿主项，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if a host item exists for the specified object; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在应用程序级外接程序来测试存在你想要关闭或保存 Excel 工作簿之前保留的托管控件，可以调用此方法。You can call this method in an application-level add-in to test for the existence of managed controls that you want to persist before closing or saving the Excel workbook. > [!NOTE] > `workbook`参数的类型是，这是父接口的。The `workbook` parameter is of type , which is the parent interface of . 因此，此方法可以接受这两种类型的对象：和。Therefore, this method can accept objects of both types: and . 通常情况下，在引用 Excel 工作簿时，您使用。Typically, when you reference an Excel workbook, you use a . ## Examples 下面的代码示例检查当前的工作簿是否具有关联的宿主项。The following code example checks whether the current workbook has an associated host item. 若要使用此代码，请在针对 `ThisAddIn` 或 [!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)]的 Excel 外接程序项目中从 [!INCLUDE[net_v45](~/includes/net-v45-md.md)] 类运行它。To use this code, run it from the `ThisAddIn` class in an Excel add-in project that targets the [!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)] or the [!INCLUDE[net_v45](~/includes/net-v45-md.md)]. [!code-csharp[Trin_ExcelAddIn_Extensions#2](~/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_OfficeSP/Trin_ExcelAddIn_Extensions/cs/ThisAddIn.cs#2)] [!code-vb[Trin_ExcelAddIn_Extensions#2](~/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_OfficeSP/Trin_ExcelAddIn_Extensions/vb/ThisAddIn.vb#2)]
